TEXT.TITLE: TORONTO SUN PLANS TWO-FOR-ONE STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: <Toronto Sun Publishing Corp> said it planned a two-for-one split of its common shares, subject to regulatory approval and approval by shareholders at the April 21 annual meeting. Reuter
